attributes.action: Equalise basic state pensions to the full new State Pension of £185.15 per week.
attributes.additional_details: Legislate and rectify this cruel anomaly.
attributes.background: To stop the injustice of a two tier pension system where pensioners, a man born on or after 6 April 1951, and a woman born on or after 6 April 1953 receive a lower basic state pension than currently being offered. We all have the same outgoings which makes this anomaly totally unfair.
